# [Interview #1075: WoR Signing Report - Sir Read-a-Lot, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1075#1)

#### Question

Was Adonalsium shattered intentionally, and if so, was the intention malevolent?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes and RAFO.
